subsection.name: Description
subsection.p: Adds a new resource host to the configuration. Once added the Transit system will consult the host when resolving artifact requests.

subsection.name: Example
subsection.p: The following example demonstrates the addition of a new resource host to the transit configuration.
subsection.pre: $ transit add host demo -url http://localhost:8080 Adding resource host: demo Saving to: local:xml:dpml/transit/config
